```{r}
library(readr)
datatran2022 <- read_delim(
  "datatran2022.csv",
  delim = ";",
  escape_double = FALSE,
  locale = locale(date_names = "pt",
                  encoding = "ISO-8859-1"),
  trim_ws = TRUE
)
View(datatran2022)

acidentes <-
   datatran2022|>  select(
    id,
    data_inversa,
    dia_semana,
    causa_acidente,
    tipo_acidente,
    classificacao_acidente,
    fase_dia,
    condicao_metereologica,
    tipo_pista,
    tracado_via,
    mortos
  ) %>%
  filter(between(mortos, 1, 7))
```
